homepage.userGuide.description.message: General documentation covering invoices, clients, payments, expenses, and all platform features.

homepage.developerResources.description.message: API integration guides, payment gateway development, and technical reference materials.

homepage.selfHosted.description.message: Install and manage your own Invoice Ninja instance. Server requirements, configuration, and updates.

homepage.migrate.description.message: Step-by-step guide to migrate your data from Invoice Ninja v4 to the latest v5 platform.

homepage.slack.description.message: Join our community chat for real-time help and discussion.

homepage.slack.secondaryText.message: Not a member? Click for invite

homepage.forum.description.message: Browse and participate in community discussions, feature requests, and support threads.

homepage.email.description.message: Reach out directly to our team for support inquiries.

homepage.demo.description.message: Try Invoice Ninja with a fully interactive demo environment. No signup required.

homepage.hostedPlatform.description.message: Quick setup on our managed cloud. No server required.

homepage.apiReference.description.message: Interactive API docs with examples for every endpoint.

homepage.legal.description.message: License, terms of service, privacy policy, and GDPR.
